at-column-definitions.description: Activity set with the associated SFC
at-column-definitions.name: X_activitySet

at-column-definitions.description: Snapshot of the status of the custom building block where the recipe entity was derived from
at-column-definitions.name: X_bbStatusOfCustomBB

at-column-definitions.description: Soft reference to system building block where this recipe entity was derived from
at-column-definitions.name: X_derivedFrom

at-column-definitions.description: Name of custom building block where this recipe entity was derived from
at-column-definitions.name: X_derivedFromCustom

at-column-definitions.description: Timestamp when the recipe entity derived from was assigned
at-column-definitions.name: X_derivedFromTimestamp

at-column-definitions.description: Description of this recipe entity
at-column-definitions.name: X_description

at-column-definitions.description: Reference (Key) to the master recipe entity (X_Operation)this control recipe entity was copied from.
at-column-definitions.name: X_fkSourceEntity

at-column-definitions.description: Snapshot of the status of the operation group where the recipe entity was derived from
at-column-definitions.name: X_groupBBStatus

at-column-definitions.description: Name of operation group where this recipe entity was derived from
at-column-definitions.name: X_groupName

at-column-definitions.description: Name of the operation in the original group at the time it was derived from
at-column-definitions.name: X_groupOrigEntityName

at-column-definitions.description: Revision of operation gorup where this recipe entity was derived from
at-column-definitions.name: X_groupRevision

at-column-definitions.description: Short description of operation group where this recipe entity was derived from
at-column-definitions.name: X_groupShortDescription

at-column-definitions.description: Timestamp when the recipe entity derived from operation group was assigned
at-column-definitions.name: X_groupTimestamp

at-column-definitions.description: Flag indicating if the building block (here: Open (white-box) BB) belongs to a Building Block Template that can be inserted via Universe + Setlist and not to a Recipe.
at-column-definitions.name: X_isCustomBB

at-column-definitions.description: Flag indicating if the Recipe entity belongs to a Master Recipe or a Control Recipe.
at-column-definitions.name: X_isMasterRecipe

at-column-definitions.description: Flag indicating if the operation can be executed multiple times in parallel on different stations (e.g. for Dispense operation this flag will be "true")
at-column-definitions.name: X_isMultipleExecAllowed

at-column-definitions.description: Flag indicating if this operation is a weigh and dispense operation
at-column-definitions.name: X_isWeighAndDispense

at-column-definitions.description: Name of this recipe entity
at-column-definitions.name: X_operationName

at-column-definitions.description: List of texts that can be selected when creating an exception or exception comment at execution
at-column-definitions.name: X_operatorExceptionTxts

at-column-definitions.description: Reference to the parent recipe entity
at-column-definitions.name: X_parent

at-column-definitions.description: List of texts that can be selected when creating an exception or exception comment at review
at-column-definitions.name: X_reviewerExceptionTxts

at-column-definitions.description: Revision of custom building block where this recipe entity was derived from
at-column-definitions.name: X_revisionOfCustomBB

at-column-definitions.description: Short description of custom building block where this recipe entity was derived from
at-column-definitions.name: X_shortDescrOfCustomBB

column.description: Reference to the parent recipe entity
column.name: X_parent

DATDefinition.description: Operation (With parent: master recipe representation otherwise whitebox building block)
DATDefinition.name: X_Operation
